column3: â€œThis time, the sugar cookie baked me.â€

â€œgreat strain to sit back and smoke on I love it's effects very nice potent high with flowing and smooth tasty smoke. buy this strain if you love strong good tasting flower and can appreciate a nice indica buzz I noticed I was off though all day which is my fault I should've been aware of this night time strain but none the less I give this strain the fullest of stars I can the only drawback is I just like Sativa domi...â€

â€œAs a sufferer of severe migraines and chronic back pain, this strain is AMAZING. Perfect pain relief, nausea relief, and very relaxing. Would also recommend for insomnia sufferers. If you don't want to be knocked out, just grab an energy drink to chug after having the stuff, and you'll be right as rain. 

As for the emotional feel...it feels like LOVE. It makes you feel warm and floaty and your heart skips a beat, an...â€
â€œDelicious, instantly takes effect. Very cerebral effect. Good night capâ€
â€œNice strain for mild chronic pain days. Great for taking a walk, napping or going to the movies. Its a fun bud that smells like mango lemonade! Went back and bought an 1/8 the day I sampled it.â€
â€œSugar Cookie is a really nice smooth smoke that tastes a bit sweet.  Got this one on sale from PRC in Phoenix.  Am so glad I got an ounce of this.  Going in the favorites.â€
â€œThee best med for bed, hands down. Tastes wonderful and can help the worst ptsd or depression.â€
â€œA really nice strain,  smooth to the flavor with an sophisticated head.  I wish I could find more of it.â€

â€œSugar cookie is a goldilocks strain. It's not too sticky but not too dry, not too colorful but not bland, not super pungent but not at all scentless. There is a decent amount of orange hairs and it's covered in tiny crystals. The sweet, flowery aroma is subtlety reflected in the taste of the bud. Sugar cookie gave me a mellow body high and helped ease my tense muscles. Although not having done much for my headache, t...â€
â€œReally nice strain. Great for mornings.â€
â€œA really nice strain,  smooth to the flavor with an sophisticated head.  I wish I could find more of it.â€

â€œJust finished an organic outdoor grow of this strain for meds grew 2 plants both organic harvested one early and pushed the second to 40% Amber.  Both are great smoke with 2-4 weeks cure respectively.  Uplifting and munchies hit now!  Then a calm feeling and either motivating or chill depending on what I seem to need to do, the down side is the end crash is very sedating.  Taste is exactly as described, earthy with p...â€
â€œNice sweet smooth taste,  good for easing anxiety or stress.  A little headache but over all my body feels good, relaxed and pain free.â€

â€œMPX-Sugar Cookie shatter-Blowing on powdered sugar cookie nice and light on lung's and rich powdered sugar taste. Effect nice and relaxing during day  CBD drops feel's nice and relaxing heart beat nice and slow.Anxiety gone not a worry in the world.Picked this great shatter from in El Mirage.â€

â€œAfter a long day of company jargon at work, you drive home in bumper to bumper traffic, my gawsh the tense feeling of the day period, you come home to a sweet strain that is perfect for moments like this. After the first puffs of this strain, relaxed is your new best friend. The strong scent and earth taste makes it worth the try. It's a great 9-5 worker strain. It kills anxiety. Immediate relaxation of the muscles. ...â€

â€œThis strain lifted my mood after having an emotional day filled with anxiety. Although it did make me giggly, that's exactly what I needed. Couldn't stop smiling. Also, back pain was at a good low.â€

â€œwow! I got a $35 eighth of what was essentially a top shelf tree at Collective Efforts in Sacramento. this tree is very, very beautiful, a nice light green completely caked in trichomes.  Smokes very well, a nice smooth burn, tastes a lot like pine and is very nice. the nugs are medium sized and very dense. Makes you a little tired but not terrible, I didn't get couch locked off of a joint.â€

â€œThis beautiful, grapety sweet, purple wonderflower hits you first and foremost with a massive body high. Then slowly creeps in the mind-numbing side of things, turning once normal, possibly productive thoughts into far reaching celestial ideas that are only now considered to be maybe possible... only to remain 90% locked in another space and time thanks to it's Northern Lights ancestry ğŸ˜ƒ Super excellent for pain and...â€

â€œI've got to say this strain creeps up on you , after a few hits your feeling the euphoria and your creativity opens up , very sweet smelling strain as well, Would recommend for anyone looking to unwind after a long day at work!â€
â€œI love this for relaxing before bed . Have not slept well for years do to back pain . Sugar Cookies to the rescue .â€

â€œA dispensary sold this to me saying it was a sativa, so I was surprised to read on leafly that it was an indica dominant hybrid. Anyway, I got a gram of shatter. It has a pretty mild, slightly sweet taste. Not a lot of terpenes. It's a pretty relaxing strain. After a long day, it's a good one to kick back with and watch some TV. I wouldn't use it as a daytime strain. Not what I was looking for, but a pretty decent fi...â€
â€œmy fiance and I love this strain. it helps my neck pain, tastes great and helps me get a great nights sleep. This is my second favourite only to the elusive laughing Buddha.â€

â€œI havenâ€™t been reviewing strains in, I guess a few months, but donâ€™t quote me on that cause I just took my 1st of ... ah a lot of hits, of Sugar Cookies!  It is so yummmy!  And true to its heritage, wow, this is gonna be quick guys.  This stuff is amazing.  No seriously f-ing incredible.  Just find it, buy it, and smoke it.  I promise u will not be upset. Perfect but not for amateurs or low tolerance smokers.   Weeee...â€
â€œluv, luv this strain as well as the folks at Ponderosa ReLeaf.  Takes care of pain better than any other strain.  nice size buds.  a bargain for the money.â€

â€œGreat tasting strain! Definitely a great nightcap as daytime use can leave a little spacey. As another reviewer stated an energy drink will counter this! Also helped out with my lower back pain and headaches. I was on a solid 4 for this one but its a 5 since I wasn't able to build a tolerance quickly for it. Definitely a go to strain for unwinding from a stressful day.â€
â€œlooove! great chilled relaxation, no anxiety, uplifting.â€

â€œI dig on a good strain of cookies. There's a tendency for high cotton mouth and that's the only thing. But great mellow high, slight appetite inducer but not the  I'm gonna kill everything in the fridge" stuff. Great she WATER

â€œDark green on the outside of the bud & a amber yellow green on the inside. Fine crystal trichomes are caked on the dense buds that had short burnt orange hairs. Strain made me feel happy, uplifted, & relaxed. As for the scent & flavor well, let's just say it is unusual. I didn't get fruity tropical. I got sweet, earthy, & coffee/nutty. Nicely done cookie, i enjoyed it.â€

â€œ.Sugar cookie possesses an aromatic sweetness and is an indica dominant hybrid which allows a person to feel relaxed and at ease. The sweetness in the smell of the strain is the most likely source that could have inspired the name Sugar Cookie. It does not belong to the same family as the Girl Scout Cookie, as many people seem to believe. Its composition and basic structure are entirely different. Actually, the Sugar...â€
â€œtaste amazing,  relaxed high , not a sleeper but its a nice bud to keep even a high tolerance  sedated throughout the dayâ€

â€œThis is my go to strain. Working long, stressful hours can leave me with anxiety and insomnia some nights. Nice to know that I can turn to the Sugar Cookie for a nice mellow night cap.  Not too many negatives with this strain, with the exception of the common dry mouth.  Enjoy!â€
â€œHas alot of little stems. Okay. It was smooth.â€

â€œGreat for pain.  This cookie isn't the one that's a Durban poison hybrid, this is the other cookie that's a hybrid with Sensi Star, hence the pain relief.  The high is much stronger than Sensi Star though.â€

â€œSugar Cookie is a relaxing indica-dominant hybrid with an aromatic sweetness that is likely to have influenced this strainâ€™s name.
